ComputationMethod: Total annual number of validated complaints registered with Labour Union
ComputationUnit: Total annual count in the Labour union registry.
Concept: A complaint arises only if user believes the department has done something incorrect or failed to do something that it should have done or acted in a way that may consider unfair.
Definition: The state of expressing dissatisfaction of one or more members of the public concerning an action or lack of action produce by a Department or about the standard of a service it produces.
Dissaggregation:
* Sex
* Age
* Department of labour
* Valid complains
* Types of complains
IndicatorShortName: Validated Complaits Registered with Labour Union
Rationale:
* To help ensure that a department or a sector continues to provide a quality service with highest standard of conduct.

* So a sector or department can assist in developing their services.

* To protect the interests of the employees of the department or sector in conducting their work efficiently, effectively and proffesional.
graph_title: Total annual number of validated complaints registered with Labour Union
